N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 530.2 - Legal Base

State Regulations
(a) Section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the Commissioner to adopt regulations that are
necessary and proper to implement matters under his or her
jurisdiction. (b) Section
31.02
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the Commissioner to issue operating
certificates for the provision of inpatient and outpatient mental health
services. (c) Section
43.02
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the Office to establish rates or methods of
payment for services at facilities subject to licensure or certification by the

Office. (d) Chapter 53 of the Laws
of 2014 authorizes the Commissioner to provide special funding to certain
designated providers. Notes
